document.full_text: a former female senior manager at kpmg filed a proposed class-action lawsuit accusing the accounting firm of discriminating against its female employees in pay, promotions and pregnancy leave.
document.title: kpmg fails to fairly promote women, lawsuit says
lines_and_colors: a former female senior manager at kpmg filed a proposed class-action lawsuit accusing the accounting firm of discriminating against its female employees in pay, promotions and pregnancy leave.
